snippet.title: Solarpunk - Official Trailer | OTK Games Expo 2024
snippet.description: Watch the latest Solarpunk trailer to see beautiful locations, building elements, and more from this upcoming survival game. Solarpunk will be available in 2025 on Steam, PS5, Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch. Solarpunk is set in a technically advanced world of floating islands. Alone or together with your friends, you can construct buildings, grow food, craft gadgets and hop on your airship to explore distant islands in the sky.
